locations: New York City, New York, USA::(on location)
imdb.plot outline: Chefs are invited to prepare a meal at the prestigious James Beard House in NYC. Cooking here is like a musician being asked to play at Carniege Hall. Cameras will capture each event as the team of chefs arrive and follow them as they prepare their meal. Shot in true observational documentary style, whatever happens, whatever problems the team of chefs encounter will be captured as it occurs.
imdb.title: Chefs of the James Beard House
akas: Chefs of the James Beard House (Canada)
plot: A behind-the-scenes glimpse into what it is like for chefs to perform at one of the most prestigious venues in the world, The James Beard House in NYC. 14 different chefs and their teams are followed as they prepare their dinner events.::John Podolak

Chefs are invited to prepare a meal at the prestigious James Beard House in NYC. Cooking here is like a musician being asked to play at Carniege Hall. Cameras will capture each event as the team of chefs arrive and follow them as they prepare their meal. Shot in true observational documentary style, whatever happens, whatever problems the team of chefs encounter will be captured as it occurs.::John Podolak
